articles.content:
Republic of Ireland manager Stephen Kenny got his wish of seeing Jason Knight return to a more advanced midfield position against Wycombe Wanderers this weekend.
The 15-cap Ireland international had… [+1792 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Holt
articles.title: Loan Watch: Fernandez makes first Championship start - Man Utd
articles.description: Our round-up of Reds on loan features a first start in the second tier for Alvaro Fernandez.
articles.content:
Elsewhere in the Championship, Ethan Laird completed another 90-minute outing, as QPR drew 0-0 at home against Stoke City. 
The 21-year-old has now played every minute of the London club's domestic … [+652 chars]

articles.author: Matt Davies
articles.title: QPR boss Michael Beale 'bored' by draw with Stoke City as he admits to penalty fear - Stoke-on-Trent Live
articles.description: Stoke City were held to a 0-0 draw at QPR as they saw huge appeals for a stoppage time penalty rejected
articles.content:
QPR boss Michael Beale has said he was left bored at half-time during his team's 0-0 draw with Stoke City.
